website_summaries.verdict: The i-Mego Ztone is marketed as an affordable onstage custom earphone quality option, but it falls short in its design and performance.
pros: Decent audio performance with deep, rich lows
Multiple ear tip options and adapter accessories
cons: Ear fitting tips do nothing to improve audio performance and plenty to mess it up
Minor distortion on deep bass at top volumes

customer_reviews.title: The Earphones are not too bad, but I have only had them for less ...
customer_reviews.text: The Earphones are not too bad, but I have only had them for less then 7 months and the wire down by the jack is broken. I have tried many times to call and left messages many time and NO ONE has called me back. I take very good care of my stuff and for the price and what they claim I don't think I should be having this Issue with them already. Not going to leave my Number on here but my email is bl6092@gmail.com. Thanks Bill
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the earbuds
customer_reviews.text: These were extraordinarily difficult to fit in my ear. You receive an assortment of replaceable tips but I find they don't fit or they don't stay on. I was looking for something I could rotate in use with my in-ears (I'm a vocalist) but regretfully these distracted me onstage all night - didn't stay in my ears, fussy tips, I'm not really even using these anymore.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these monitors!!!! They sound fantastic right out of the box, then once you put about 300 to 400 hours they sound even better. After wearing these I'm never going back to regular headphones. In Ear Monitors all the way!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GreeneBean3408

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for you Buck
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few these are Great very high quality product...Best BANG for your buck...GREAT SOUND deep bass crisp highs very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Evan Archibald

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great delivery time. Great product! You must to have it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Balanced
customer_reviews.text: Not quite perfect, close. Using for live stage. A balanced mix with a good amount of Bass but not too much.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Holland

customer_reviews.title: Love these earphones!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent earphones! Replaces the bulky boxey monitors I had been using. Fits nicely in my ear. Nice full tones when I use them. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: CDCwoman

customer_reviews.title: best investment
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product sounds really good.. My church is looking into buying some for the whole group.. It comes with a nice little case. They are really good and they work excellent would definatly recommend. At first i only used them for in ear monitors but know i use them for my ipod as well. I use them all the time
customer_reviews.author: Hiran C.

customer_reviews.title: Really Good
customer_reviews.text: These are really good, if you're looking for your first in ear monitors these are worth it. The cable has a good quality, the molded in ear comes with 4 pieces to adjust to your ear and the sound quality is not that bad for the price you're paying.
customer_reviews.author: Jose arturo Bruschi Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Boroken right earphone after 8 month seldom use, sounds like from flush tank.
customer_reviews.author: anton

product_meta.title: I-MEGO In-Ear Monitor Earphones, ZTONE, Silver
product_meta.description: Color:Silver| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingMusicians have long used custom earphones, called monitors, to accurately hear their music on stage. The vision for ZTONE (pronounced: stone) is to bring this on-stage earphone quality to your everyday life. Utilizing a patent-pending design that form-fits and locks in your ear, ZTONE provides a secure, comfortable fit through four pairs of custom-molded ear gels. Genuine silver braided cables carry untarnished audio to the studio-tuned monitors and securely fit behind your ear. ZTONE completes the package with an elegant design that compliments both your taste in music and your style.
feature_bullets: Custom-molded ear gels create secure fit
Genuine silver braided cables for untarnished audio signal

ZTONE was selected as an International CES Innovations 2013 Design and Engineering Awards Honoree, ZTONE won the A Design Award, ZTONE won the Plus X Award, achieved for: High Quality, Design, and Ergonomics.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars19 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
